mapper.sql:
select rownum, mem_no, substr(mem_id,1,3) mem_id, substr(mem_name,1,2) mem_name, mem_registdate, mem_updatedate from member
mem_id like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mem_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
to_char(mem_registdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') between #{keyword} and #{keyword1}
mapper.select: /* memberDetail */ select * from terms_agree inner join terms on terms_agree.ter_no = terms.ter_no inner join member on member.mem_no = terms_agree.mem_no where member.mem_no = #{mem_no}
/* adminCheck */ select adm_name, adm_id from admin where adm_id = #{adm_id} and adm_pwd = #{adm_pwd}
/* pwdChange */ select nvl((select 1 from admin where adm_pwd = #{adm_pwd}),0) as state from dual
mapper.update: /* pwdChange2 */ update admin set adm_pwd = #{adm_pwd} where adm_name = #{adm_name}
mapper.select: /* memberToday */ select count(mem_no) from member where to_char(mem_registdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD')
/* memberYesterday */ select count(mem_no) from member where to_char(mem_registdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate-1,'YYYY-MM-DD')
/* memberWeek */ select count(mem_no) from member where to_char(mem_registdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate-7,'YYYY-MM-DD')
/* memberMonth */ select count(mem_no) from member where to_char(mem_registdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= to_char(sysdate-30,'YYYY-MM-DD')
